name: The English
declaringWar: As our protests are in vain, we hereby declare war.
attacked: War? We are not amused...
defeated: This severe and afflicting loss will not be sustained, and England, thank providence, will ascend again.
denounced: The Queen wishes to warn those who disrespect her people and her mandate of the manifold troubles that will ensue.
introduction: Greetings. We are by the Grace of God, Victoria, Queen of the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Ireland. And soon, dare I say, the empire.
tradeRequest: Would you be interested in a trade agreement with England?
declaringFriendship: We are pleased to consider you an esteemed friend. We hope the feeling is mutual...
uniques: [+1 Gold, +1 Science] [in all cities connected to capital]

name: The Romans
declaringWar: The die is cast.
attacked: Ambitious. You seek to conquer me before I move on you. I approve.
denounced: You had better mean what you say. I, for one, do not make idle threats..!
introduction: I am Caesar, destroyer of conspiracies in the Alpine woods and the Senate alike.
tradeRequest: I offer this, for your consideration.
declaringFriendship: Rome is not without its graces. Come into friendship with us.
uniques: [+25]% Production towards any buildings that already exist in the Capital

name: The Chinese
declaringWar: It is not my wish to conquer your realm by force, but there is no other way..!
attacked: You might as well conquer the heaven itself, Hahaha! Now I see whom had you targeted when you were still controlling your bowstrings earlier.
defeated: The road ahead is dark, the surrounding pines are dense like walls, the sky and earth are full dark as lacquer.
introduction: I'm the Yongle Emperor, those who come in merchant ships are my friends. Is there any future for those who oppose my will?
tradeRequest: My friend, do you think you can accept this request?
declaringFriendship: We are building a coalition of like-minded people. Shall you take part?
uniques: Enables conversion of city production to [Gold]

name: The Arabs
declaringWar: I promise none of us will taste peace, until you concede...
attacked: It's shameful that we turn to violence, for it is not the behavior of kings to kill each other!
defeated: This is not victory. 'Victory' is changing the hearts of your opponents; through gentleness, through kindness...
denounced: Everyone is critical of the flaws of others, but blind to their own.
introduction: By the grace of the one God, the powerful, the victorious, the everlasting of whose Kingdom there is no end, I greet you, my sincere friend.
declaringFriendship: I understand now that you are a friend to my nation. Let us declare our friendship to the world.
uniques: Empire enters a [10]-turn Golden Age <upon founding a Religion>

name: The Greeks
declaringWar: This is for the greater good. You will understand... in time.
attacked: Soldiers are not like trees. When they are destroyed, they are not so easily replaced.
defeated: You may have defeated us, but what we leave behind is woven into the lives of others.
denounced: All leaders incur hatred and unpopularity; if one has a great aim to pursue, this burden of envy must be accepted.
introduction: Hello, I am Pericles of Athens and I greet you on behalf of the Democracy. I trust you'll let me conduct my business with these neutral parties?
tradeRequest: My friend, does this seem reasonable to you?
declaringFriendship: Let's put our differences aside for a moment, shall we? Friendship is more important than petty politics.
uniques: Gifts of Gold to City-States generate [+30]% more Influence

name: The Indians
declaringWar: Your territory could be much improved under Indian rule. Best I see it through!
attacked: India does not fear war. The most you can do is slow our rightful advance.
defeated: You learned my own lessons far too well. I instructed you in my own demise.
denounced: All leaders incur hatred and unpopularity; if one has a great aim to pursue, this burden of envy must be accepted.
introduction: I am Chandragupta, Mauryan emperor of unified India. No, it has not gone to my head.
tradeRequest: My friend, are you interested in this arrangement?
declaringFriendship: India thinks highly of your people. With your permission, I will declare our mutual friendship to all!
uniques: [+30]% unhappiness from the number of cities

name: The Americans
declaringWar: I wanted to avoid this, you know... But your idea of peace left me no choice!
attacked: If I must choose between righteousness and peace, I choose righteousness.
defeated: Congratulations. Instead of the United States of America, your nation will go far...
introduction: Welcome to the United States of America! If you conduct yourself well, you can consider us friends.
tradeRequest: Is the following trade of interest to you?
declaringFriendship: You have earned my respect. Shall we declare our friendship?
uniques: [-15]% Culture cost of adopting new Policies
[-20]% unhappiness from the number of cities

name: The Germans
declaringWar: You were well warned, but still you seek conflict. Now you will learn your lesson, as many other men have before you!
attacked: How do you want to defeat me, when I destroyed so many enemies?
defeated: I maintained piety and blessedness... but never mind that. You have achieved victory... May your empire be free of hate, and of fighting.
denounced: I should answer you with my sword... perhaps I will...
introduction: God greets you, traveller. I am Emperor Frederick and rule over German and Welsh lands, over Burgundy and many more. I know surely that you, too, can embrace righteous force.
tradeRequest: It would be in your best interest, to carefully consider this proposal.
declaringFriendship: Again we extend our hand, but this time in friendship. Will you accept it?

name: The Russians
declaringWar: I hereby proclaim you an enemy to Russia, our allies, and God, may he have mercy on your soul.
attacked: Your war is futile. It's impossible to defeat Russia! Whoever will come to us with a sword, from a sword will perish!
defeated: I am defeated. To live one's life is not like crossing a field.
denounced: My people live through winters more dangerous than your army. Do you think we’re afraid of your threats?
introduction: Hello! I am Tsar Peter. A worthy ruler such as yourself must appreciate all the most exquisite things. Do you like art as I do?
tradeRequest: How would you like it if I propose this kind of exchange?
declaringFriendship: I am honored to extend to you my friendship, and a friendship between our nations. Do you accept?
uniques: [-35]% Culture cost of natural border growth [in all cities]
[+1 Faith, +1 Production] from [Tundra] tiles [in all cities]

name: The Mongols
declaringWar: Did you try to stand in the way of my great army? Soon you will bow before my great troops.
attacked: There is no need to speak many words. Today, the Mongols will ensure your defeat!
defeated: You deceived the Mongols, and now in my eyes you're as disgusting as snot from the nose and vomit from the mouth.
denounced: Foolish and feeble! How have you not been conquered yet?
introduction: I am Genghis Khan. Before me vast Mongolian steppe, behind me a mighty and great horse army.
tradeRequest: I am not always this generous, but we hope you take this rare opportunity we give you.
declaringFriendship: Accept Mongolia's friendship! I want to see the world tremble when they learn we are united.

name: The Spanish
declaringWar: God will probably forgive you. But I will not. Prepare for war.
attacked: Repugnant spawn of the devil! You will pay!
defeated: Very well. This is undoubtedly the will of God. And I must accept it.
denounced: There is no greater sin than to defy the anointed servant of the Lord. You will pay dearly for this.
introduction: God blesses those who deserve it. I am Isabella of Spain.
tradeRequest: I hope this deal will receive your blessing.
declaringFriendship: I believe you have seen the wisdom in the light of the Lord. Let us share in friendship his blessing.
uniques: [+2 Gold] from [Luxury resource] tiles [in all cities]
[+50]% Production when constructing [Settler] units [in all cities] <starting from the [Age of Discovery]>

name: The French
declaringWar: I have made all the calculations; fate will do the rest.
attacked: The bullet that is to kill me has not yet melted.
defeated: Exile. I will write my epics. The effort will cut the course of time.
denounced: The glory and might of France will not be tarnished by such obvious lies.
introduction: I am Napoleon, here on this earth to determine the fate of the world.
tradeRequest: France offers you this exceptional proposition.
declaringFriendship: I extend to you the royal hand in friendship. Do you accept it?

name: The Turkish
declaringWar: Your continued insolence and failure to recognize any preeminence leads us to war.
attacked: Oh, good. The world shall witness the incontestable might of my armies and the glory of The Republic of Turkey.
defeated: You ruined it! You ruined it! Istanbul becomes the city of Iram, remembered only by poets suffering from melancholy.
denounced: You are the liege of the viper, the jackal, the vulture, the hyena, the rat—all things hateful and spiteful claim you as their ruler.
introduction: Merhaba! I am Mustafa Kemal Atatürk and I am the president of the newley founded Republic of Turkey.
hateHello: Tüm bu hakaretler ve küfürler bunun için mi? Hayal kırıklığına uğradım...
tradeRequest: The Republic of Turkey offers you this exceptional proposition.
declaringFriendship: As your behavior towards me is always proper, I give you leave to publicly claim my friendship.
uniques: [+25]% Production when constructing [Siege] units [in all cities]

declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: I guess you weren't here for the sprouts after all...
